category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
GOD, YOU LOVE YOUR PEOPLE.
You've placed my whole life in the hands of Jesus—
my savior, my leader, my closest companion, and my friend—
and You care for me through Him.

Keep me holy, innocent, pure, and set apart from sin.
Help me to ignore the voices that pull me away from You,
so I can just go to Jesus where He is and follow where He leads.

You've already washed me clean for good in the fountain of forgiveness.
Now please cleanse me from this week's mess—
from my mistakes, my character flaws, and my unhealthy extremes,
so that my life can reflect the perfect character of Jesus.

O Master, who washed Your disciples' feet,
please be that patient with me.
Be gracious with my faults,
and stick with me until the great work You're doing in me is complete.

I want to conquer my selfish desires in every way,
to overcome my sinful nature,
to guard myself from obvious sins,
and to control the clever arguments of my own mind.
I want to live completely for Your glory,
ignoring both unfair criticism and empty praise from others.

Nothing can truly hurt the new person I am in You;
that part of me can't be struck down or die.
Nothing can ruin the work of Your Spirit inside of me.
It's enough to have Your approval and a clear conscience.

Keep me humble, dependent on You, and filled with joy.
Help me be as calm as a child who trusts completely,
yet at the same time, passionate and active.

I don't want to focus so much on doing as on being,
and I long to be like Jesus.
If You are the one making me right, then I know I will be right.
Lord, I belong to You; make me worthy of You.
